originalText.text: I definitely recommend booking an appointment. The owner was attentive and supportive during the session. This was my first time doing a yoni steam. Afterwards I felt relaxed and sleepy:)

text.text: I definitely recommend booking an appointment. The owner was attentive and supportive during the session. This was my first time doing a yoni steam. Afterwards I felt relaxed and sleepy:)

originalText.text:
Too bad there are only five stars here.  I would give Sweet Yoni Spa Care a 10, for the knowledge, care, environment, and customer service they provide.  They care about you and your health and peace of mind.  There are so many benefits to the service they provide that I knew nothing about until I was introduced to Yoni steaming by the owner.

The experience was relaxing not only because of the music, but during the steaming I felt my organs relax as though swelling went down.  This surprised me because I did not know there was inflamation in my lower extremeties.  It's been a week and I my lower half still feels relaxed.  Let me not forget to mention the detox, snap back and moisture I am experiencing.  Yoni steaming will be a regular part of my self-care regimen.

originalText.text: When I say Sweet Yoni is the place to be when you want to get some much needed "me time" amd R&R I am speaking truth. I'd most definitely recommend you book your appointment. Perhaps even ask if they have a Sweet Yoni Girls Day of Relaxation where you and your sister friends can book together. It's relaxing, refreshing, and the ambiance is everything awesome as is the owner Ms. Sherneice Gatewood-Alli.
